body:
The Application Control and URL Filtering Policy determines who can access which applications and sites from an organisation. The primary component of the Policy is the Rule Base.

Based on the Gaia's version, number of categories can change.

For Gaia version R75.20 and above, there are 60+ categories while versions prior to this have 40 categories. For more info, check this link.

Full list of categories are available here.

Hope it helps !!!
title: Check Point URL filtering categories
